title: Golf
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,064 words, Level R (Grade 3), Lexile 880L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and Y
description: Requiring patience and skill, the sport of Golf has remained popular since its invention in the 1400s. This book explores not only the game's history and rules, but also some legendary players. Photos and diagrams enhance the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
